comments.body: Are we expecting to leave debug things in ? If we are, is there any harm in them being expressions rather than functions?

this debug thing is a small library which only logs when there is a special env variable or command line argument present, otherwise it is ignored.

It's imported at top of the file: `debug = require('debug')('webide:session'),`

I don't need to use it but found it helpful. It is smaller than a full logging library, which is probably overkill...the way we're running this service in the cloud, all we need is standard error/out
or in other words ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ javascript
